message.text: Don't give up keep fighting and live each day to the fullest
Thank you for taking care of the cancer patients.
You all are truly angels, fighting to keep people alive and helping all of those who are sick.
We are here to support you and will stand by you during your dark days. Get well soon!
Be strong because things will get better. Things may look stormy now, but it can’t rain forever.
Thank you for all the hard work and extra effort needed to work with patients especially during this COVID period.
Let’s work together to fight cancer and COVID admidst these difficult times.
